name: aos-graphql
description: AOS modules for building with graphql. GraphQL Runtime implemented in Lua+C. ao GraphQL Server with aos integration. Arweave Gateway Implementation
author: Tyler Hall<tyler@hyper.io>

scripts.build:sm: (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=ON -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=OFF -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=sm .. && make clean all) && mv process.wasm process.sm.wasm
scripts.build:xxl: (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=ON -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=OFF -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=xxl .. && make clean all) && mv process.wasm process.xxl.wasm
scripts.build:bare: (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=OFF -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=OFF -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=sm .. && make clean all) && mv process.wasm process.bare.wasm
scripts.build:sandbox: run-p bundle:* && (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=ON -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=ON -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=sm .. && make clean all) && mv process.wasm process.sandbox.wasm
scripts.deploy:sm: ao publish -w ./wallet.json process.sm.wasm -t Memory-Limit -v 1-gb -t Compute-Limit -v 9000000000000 -t Module-Format -v wasm64-unknown-emscripten-draft_2024_02_15 -t Name -v aos-graphql-sqlite-sm
scripts.deploy:xxl: ao publish -w ./wallet.json process.xxl.wasm -t Memory-Limit -v 16-gb -t Compute-Limit -v 9000000000000 -t Module-Format -v wasm64-unknown-emscripten-draft_2024_02_15 -t Name -v aos-graphql-sqlite-xxl
